```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
data = fread("data/results/data_ssf_coefs.csv")
```

```{r}
dcast(
  data,
  TAG + sp + date + treat + rrv_calc~ term,
  value.var = "estimate_corrected"
) |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      ndvi, vis,
      col = rrv_calc
    )
  )+
  geom_jitter()+
  geom_smooth(
    aes(
      group = interaction(
        sp, treat
      )
    ),
    method = "glm",
    se = F
  )+
  scale_x_reverse()+
  coord_cartesian(
    ylim = c(NA, 100)
  )+
  facet_grid(
    treat~sp
  )
```
